title: Correction: Etk/Bmx Regulates Proteinase-Activated-Receptor1 (PAR1) in Breast Cancer Invasion: Signaling Partners, Hierarchy and Physiological Significance
full_text: PLoS One PLoS ONE plos plosone PLoS ONE 1932-6203 Public Library of Science San Francisco, USA 3012824 10.1371/annotation/7ed84180-ec3d-46c0-8c10-f7b830999f8d Correction Correction: Etk/Bmx Regulates Proteinase-Activated-Receptor1 (PAR 1 ) in Breast Cancer Invasion: Signaling Partners, Hierarchy and Physiological Significance Correction Cohen Irit Maoz Myriam Turm Hagit Grisaru-Granovsky Sorina Maly Bella Uziely Beatrice Weiss Einat Abramovitch Rinat Gross Eithan Barzilay Oded Qiu Yun Bar-Shavit Rachel 2010 29 12 2010 5 12 10.1371/annotation/7ed84180-ec3d-46c0-8c10-f7b830999f8d Public Library of Science. 2010 This is an open-access article distributed under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution License, which permits unrestricted use, distribution, and reproduction in any medium, provided the original author and source are properly credited. Etk/Bmx Regulates Proteinase-Activated-Receptor1 (PAR 1 ) in Breast Cancer Invasion: Signaling Partners, Hierarchy and Physiological Significance The author noted multiple errors in the original reference section.
